posts.post_title: FS (Price reduced) - T206 Evers Portrait P350 PSA 6(mc) Beautiful card.
posts.post_content: For Sale (Price reduced) - T206 Evers Portrait P350 PSA 6(mc) Razor sharp, no name, huge top border, great color .  $1250 venmo no fee or $1300 pp gs.  Includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob I  (NC residents add 6.75% ST to any agreed upon price).
